sentences.en: A: I'm an entertainer; my job is to make people laugh.
sentences.cn: 我是个艺人, 我的工作就是将欢笑带给人们.

sentences.en: En 2003, on avait vant é les qualit é s d'entertainer du bonhomme.
sentences.cn: 2003年, 我们就对这家伙的演唱质量赞叹不已.

sentences.en: He an entertainer who impersonates celebrities at night clubs.
sentences.cn: 他在夜总会表演名人模仿秀.

sentences.en: He was a great entertainer but going insane.
sentences.cn: 虽然他还是那样善于逗趣,但他的神经显然越来越不正常了.

sentences.en: I get my kicks from Billy Simpson . What a great entertainer!
sentences.cn: 我十分喜欢看比利·辛普森的表演. 他真是个杰出的艺术家!

sentences.en: If you didn't become an entertainer, what would you be doing now?
sentences.cn: 冈:如果你不进入演艺圈, 你现在会在做什么 呢 ?

sentences.en: Licking his fingers, smoothing his eyebrows, patting his hair, ever the entertainer.
sentences.cn: 舔指头 、 拨弄眉毛 、 拍头发, 像个演员.

sentences.en: Meh . As a character and entertainer, I enjoyed him.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢阿泰作为艺人和娱乐圈人士的一面.

sentences.en: Sinatra remains one of the top entertainers of all time.
sentences.cn: 西纳特拉一直是最著名的艺人之一。

sentences.en: Some have called him the greatest entertainer of the twentieth century.
sentences.cn: 有人曾称他为20世纪最伟大的艺人。

sentences.en: The engagement of a well - known entertainer obviously gives the hotel an excellent promotional opportunity.
sentences.cn: 能邀请到著名的表演者显然是旅馆的最好宣传.

sentences.en: The quintessential entertainer - entrepreneur wielded unmatched influence over our childhood.
sentences.cn: 娱乐业商人的典范,对我们的童年产生了巨大的影响.

sentences.en: The section chief is quite an entertainer. I never would have guessed.
sentences.cn: 主管对表演真有一套,实在出乎我的意料.

sentences.en: The singer A Do had engaged in construction before becoming an entertainer.
sentences.cn: 歌手阿杜在进入娱乐圈之前曾从事过建筑行业.

sentences.en: They were all attracted by the amusing entertainer.
sentences.cn: 他们都被这个滑稽的表演艺人所吸引.

sentences.en: Two small boys and a dog comprised the street entertainer's only audience.
sentences.cn: 两个小男孩和一条狗成了街头艺人仅有的观众.

trans.tran_cn: 表演者，演艺人员，款待者
trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to tell jokes, sing etc in order to entertain people
